short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a filter dropdown to the PyCon India funnel page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The PyCon India Funnel page has over 100 proposals and it is really hard to navigate between those proposals. This app will introduce a filter on top of the listings which can be used to filter the listings based on the different sections.
